The Voice of the Beloved.

EWARE of curious and of useless searchings Into this sacrament so deep, If you would not be plunged into the gulf of doubt. The searcher of its majesty By its glory will be crushed. God can do more Than man can understand. God will allow a holy and a humble search into the truth, A searching spirit ever ready to be taught, Willing to walk on in the wholesome precepts of the fathers. Blest the simplicity That leaves the thorny ways that questions lead to, Going upon the path of God's commandments, plain and firm. Many have lost their thoughts of God In wishing to investigate the greater depths.
